intro: Shape stones into masterpieces as Michelangelo.
description:
Immerse yourself in the world of the Renaissance around 1495 and shape stone blocks into masterpieces as Michelangelo. Chisel stone, collect XP and unlock skills. No stress, no hectic - just you and the stone.

Look forward to a relaxing evening.

Meet Leonardo da Vinci's sister Isabella and her cute cat Gnocchi, chisel your way through eight missions and live up to the name Michelangelo!

We wish you lots of fun!
Three River Games (3RG)
